terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.intro: Please read the following terms carefully before using our services.
terms.content:
1. You must be at least 18 years old to use this app.
2. Your personal information will be kept confidential.
3. You agree to the tontine rules upon joining.
4. Violations of the rules may result in suspension.
5. All financial transactions are recorded for transparency.
terms.feesNotice: Sendo charges fees on contributions and fund distributions.
